subdesc.subtitle: Overview
subdesc.subdescription: Lagori is a Folk / Fusion Rock band from Bangalore. The band consist a group of musicians with varied musical influences, who have come together to dish out foot tapping, soul stirring music. Lagori makes Indian music with a twist, melodic and intense and at the same time fun and energetic. Although Lagori draws influences from the flavour of each musician - ranging from Hindustani, Soul, Funk, Rock, Blues and Metal, the end result is a unique sound which at the same time has a tinge of familiarity to it. While the band uses Hindi to communicate their inspirations and message, the music is something that everyone - despite lingual differences - will understand.

subdesc.subtitle: Overview
subdesc.subdescription: DJ night by DJ Suparna a Fun loving, energetic DJ, who loves to play house / electro / psy among other generes and can make the crowd dance to her tunes.

subdesc.subtitle: Overview
subdesc.subdescription: Experience stand up comedy like never seen before by one of the finest comedian of the country Rajnish Trivedi. Rajnish Trivedi has participated in many TV Serials & Interviews including the likes of The Great Indian Laughter Challenge Part 1 and The Great Indian Laughter Champion to name a few. Come enjoy the stunning , mind chilling performance by Rajnish Trivedi.
